snippet: Recalled batsman Neil Broom scored his maiden one-day century and took two crucial catches as New Zealand completed a 67-run victory over Bangladesh in the second one-day international at Saxton Oval in Nelson on Thursday....
lead_paragraph: Recalled batsman Neil Broom scored his maiden one-day century and took two crucial catches as New Zealand completed a 67-run victory over Bangladesh in the second one-day international at Saxton Oval in Nelson on Thursday.

headline.main: Broom Sweeps Bangladesh Aside to Complete Series Win
headline.print_headline: Broom Sweeps Bangladesh Aside to Complete Series Win
